LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.label: Extreme heat
LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.description: Heavy duty heat wave overtook the planet. The temperature can rise to 100 degrees Celsius!
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.label: Meteor Rain
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.description: Meteor Rain! For some time, meteorites will fall to the ground.
LanguageData.Endlessday.label: Endless day
LanguageData.Endlessday.description: Because of the powerful flash of a distant star on the planet now is the day. At night too.
LanguageData.Endlessday.endMessage: The cycle of day and night returned to normal
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.label: Lean atmosphere
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.description: Due to the release of the colossal amount of energy of a star exploding in the distance, a part of the planet’s atmosphere has burnt out. This has significantly changed the local climatic conditions. The range of temperature fluctuations has increased.
LanguageData.RadiationFon.label: Increased Radiation
LanguageData.RadiationFon.description: Due to the large number of ozone holes, cosmic radiation easily passes through the atmosphere. Frequent presence on the open area is fraught with radiation.
LanguageData.NoSun.label: No sun
LanguageData.NoSun.description: In this system, there are no stars that can heat and illuminate the planets. Endless darkness and extremely low temperatures are ensured.
LanguageData.DenseAtmosphere.label: Dense Atmosphere
LanguageData.DenseAtmosphere.description: The planet has a very dense atmosphere, which leads to a greenhouse effect
LanguageData.IceStorm.label: Ice Storm
LanguageData.IceStorm.description: An ice storm overtook you. This storm carries incredible low temperatures and ice fragments. Do not leave the house
LanguageData.HeavyAir.label: Heavy Air
LanguageData.HeavyAir.description: The air flow brought a large amount of heavy gases, they make breathing difficult and poison the body, you need to wait a couple of days
LanguageData.HeavyAir.endMessage: It seems the bulk of the heavy elements have been blown away
LanguageData.SandStorm.label: Sand storm
LanguageData.SandStorm.description: A sandstorm is coming. During this time, will be reduced visibility, speed
LanguageData.ClimateChaos.label: Climate chaos
LanguageData.ClimateChaos.description: Due to the powerful release of energy, a climatic shift has occurred. The constant change of weather and weather disasters.
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.label: Ionized atmosphere
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.description: The ionosphere layer is significantly larger than ever. This increases the chance of thunderstorms.
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.endMessage: The size of the ionosphere has decreased
LanguageData.Earthquake.label: Earthquake
LanguageData.Earthquake.description: An earthquake began, everyone in the shelter!
